mapper.select: select rownum rn, event_ID, title, contents, poster, img, wdate, start, end from ( select * from gc_event where (START <= to_date(#{today})) and (END >= to_date(#{today})) order by event_id desc)
select rownum rn, event_ID, title, contents, poster, img, wdate, start, end, (end - to_date(#{today})) as dday from ( select * from gc_event where end <= to_date(#{today}) order by end)
